remarks: A functor on categories yields a functor on the opposite categories (in the same direction), see definition 3.41 of [Adamek] p. 39. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
funcoppc.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
funcoppc.p $e |- P = ( oppCat ` D ) $.
funcoppc.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Func D ) G ) $.
funcoppc $p |- ( ph -> F ( O Func P ) tpos G ) $.
